import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const [title,settitle]=useState() const [imageUrl,setimageUrl]=useState() const [description,setdescription]=useState() const [movielink,setmovielink]=useState() const p=useParams() const edit=async()=>{ await axios.put("http://localhost:4010/edit/"+p.id, {title,imageUrl,description,movielink}); useEffect() } return (

Add Movie

settitle(e.target.value)} value={title} />
setimageUrl(e.target.value)} value={imageUrl} />
setdescription(e.target.value)} value={description} />
setmovielink(e.target.value)} value={movielink} />
) } export default Edit
